      • onSslError

        public abstract void onSslError(SslErrorHandler handler,
              SslError error)
        This indicates a SSL Error, implement this method to handle this error.
        Parameters:
        handler - SslErrorHandler the handler handle this error. For example, you can simply do handler.process() to ignore this error or handler.cancel() to stop web page loading.
        error - error details.

      • onError

        public abstract void onError(int errorCode,
           java.lang.String description,
           java.lang.String failingUrl)
        This indicates the webview receives some error. Implement this method to handle properly.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - error code
        description - description of the error
        failingUrl - the failing url
